Title: Proposes to limit state revenue growth, creates a revenue limitation and establishes a budget stabilization fund
Summary: Implements provisions to limit state revenue growth; creates a revenue limitation; establishes a budget stabilization fund; sets rates for allowable growth; exempts emergencies declared by the governor; permits taxpayers to bring action to enforce revenue limitations.
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to article 7 of the constitution, relating to limiting the growth of New York state revenue, creates a revenue limitation and establishes a budget stabilization fund
